title: Walk-in closets, Assigned Parking, Heated Pool/Spa, 3 Laundry Rooms
neighborhood: 17171 West Roscoe Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: ['Located in Northridge, CA, Village Pointe is an apartment community with a laid-back, resort-style atmosphere that blends Mediterranean architecture with 6 acres of tropical garden paths and courtyards.', "With a dedicated onsite management team that treats the residents like family, Village Pointe is not just your home, it's your community.", '- Walk-in closets', '- Designer window coverings', '- Conveniently near the 405, 101, and 118 Freeways', '- Fully gated community', '- Onsite fitness center', '- Assigned/ covered parking', '- Garden, pool and greenbelt views', '- Balcony or patio', '- Ceiling fan', '- Relaxing jet spa', '- Vaulted ceilings', '- Large year-round resort-style heated pool', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing is subject to change.', 'Call for details.']
